sentence.Network_en: Not long after Marco came home, the Genoese captured him during a battle at sea.
sentence.Network_cn: 马可-波罗回到家乡不久,在一次海上的战役中被热那亚人俘虏.

sentence.Network_en: There were many reasons why the thought of a Genoese should be turned in this direction.
sentence.Network_cn: 为什么一个热那亚人的思路居然会朝着这个方向,其中有许多原因.

sentence.Network_en: For use in melee, Genoese Crossbowmen are also equipped with a long sword.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了肉搏热那亚十字弓手也会装备一柄长剑.
